title: Citizens' Party for Revival
text:
The Citizens' Party for Revival () is a <a href="liberalism">liberal</a> <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in <a href="Mali">Mali</a>. In the 1 July and 22 July 2007 <a href="Mali">Mali</a>an parliamentary <a href="Malian%20parliamentary%20election%2C%202007">elections</a>, the party won 1 out of 160 seats. The party is affiliated to the <a href="Alliance%20for%20Democracy%20and%20Progress%20%28Mali%29">Alliance for Democracy and Progress</a>, which supported former president <a href="Amadou%20Toumani%20Tour%C3%A9">Amadou Toumani Touré</a>.
The party contested the <a href="Malian%20parliamentary%20election%2C%202013">2013 parliamentary elections</a>, but failed to win a seat.
